Description_lang: $?c2[Consuming Burden of Power causes your next cast of Fire Blast to strike up to ${$451073s3-1}  additional targets and call down a storm of $s1 Meteorites on its target.Each Meteorite's impact reduces the cooldown of Fire Blast by ${$s2/1000}.1 sec.][Consuming Burden of Power causes your next Arcane Barrage to deal $451073s2% increased damage, grant $s4 Arcane Charges, and call down a storm of $s1 Meteorites at your target.]
AuraDescription_lang: Your next $?c1[Arcane Barrage deals $451073s2% increased damage, refunds $s4 Arcane Charges,][Fire Blast strikes up to ${$451073s3-1} nearby enemies] and calls down a storm of $s1 Meteorites on its target.

description_blz.en_US: Consuming Burden of Power causes your next Arcane Barrage to deal 20% increased damage, grant 4 Arcane Charges, and call down a storm of 4 Meteorites at your target.
description_blz.es_MX: Consumir Peso del poder hace que tu siguiente lanzamiento de Tromba arcana inflija un 20% más de daño, otorgue 4 cargas arcanas y desate una tormenta de 4 Meteoritos sobre tu objetivo.
description_blz.pt_BR: Consumir Fardo do Poder faz sua próxima Salva Arcana causar 20% a mais de dano, concede 4 Cargas Arcanas e evoca uma tempestade de 4 Meteoritos no seu alvo.
description_blz.de_DE: Das Verbrauchen von 'Bürde der Macht' lässt Euren nächsten Einsatz von 'Arkanbeschuss' 20% mehr Schaden verursachen, 4 Arkane Aufladungen erzeugen und einen Schauer von 4 Meteoriten auf Euer Ziel herabregnen.
description_blz.en_GB: Consuming Burden of Power causes your next Arcane Barrage to deal 20% increased damage, grant 4 Arcane Charges, and call down a storm of 4 Meteorites at your target.
description_blz.es_ES: Al consumir Carga de poder, tu siguiente lanzamiento de Tromba Arcana infligirá un 20% más de daño, otorgará 4 cargas Arcanas e invocará una tormenta de 4 meteoritos sobre tu objetivo.
description_blz.fr_FR: La consommation de Fardeau du pouvoir permet à votre prochain Barrage des arcanes d’infliger 20 % de dégâts supplémentaires, de conférer 4 charges arcaniques et d’appeler une tempête de 4 météores sur votre cible.
description_blz.it_IT: Consumare Fardello del Potere fa sì che il successivo lancio di Sbarramento Arcano infligga il 20% di danni aggiuntivi, fornisca 4 cariche arcane e richiami una tempesta di 4 Meteoriti sul bersaglio.
description_blz.ru_RU: Когда вы поглощаете "Бремя силы", ваш следующий "Чародейский обстрел" наносит на 20% больше урона, дает 4 чародейских заряда и призывает с небес 4 метеорита, обрушивающихся на цель.
description_blz.ko_KR: 힘의 무게를 소모하면 다음 비전 탄막이 20%의 추가 피해를 입히며, 비전 충전물 4개를 생성하고 대상에게 유성 파편 4개를 불러 내립니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 消耗力量的重擔會使你下一個秘法彈幕造成的傷害提高20%，賦予4層秘法充能，並對你的目標召喚4個隕星構成的風暴。
description_blz.zh_CN: 消耗力量的重担使你施放的下一个奥术弹幕造成的伤害提高20%，提供4层奥术充能，并且会召唤4颗陨星砸向你的目标。
